# Spells (Alphabetical List - R)
## Ra-Re
**[[Radiance (Spell)|Radiance]]****:** Creates daylight that dazzles undead.

**[[Radiant Assault (Spell)|Radiant Assault]]****:** 1d6 damage/level, victims [[Dazed|dazed]] or [[Dazzled|dazzled]].

**[[Radiant Burst (Spell)|Radiant Burst]]****:** Evil creatures are [[Blinded|blinded]] for 1 round and take 1d6 damage/2 levels.

**[[Radiant Fog (Spell)|Radiant Fog]]****:** As *[[Solid Fog (Spell)|solid fog]]*, but dazzles or blinds creatures within.

**[[Radiant Shield (Spell)|Radiant Shield]]****:** Creatures attacking you take electricity damage; you’re protected from electricity.

**[[Rage (Spell)|Rage]]****:** Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

**[[Raging Flame (Spell)|Raging Flame]]****:** Fires burn twice as hot, half as long.

**[[Raging Rubble (Spell)|Raging Rubble]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Animate an area of rocks to create a dangerous, rolling area of debris.

**[[Rain of Arrows (Spell)|Rain of Arrows]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Conjure a cloud of magical arrows.

**[[Rain of Black Tulips (Spell)|Rain of Black Tulips]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Black tulips fall from the sky; evil creatures take 5d6 damage per round and are [[Nauseated|nauseated]].

**[[Rain of Embers (Spell)|Rain of Embers]]****:** Rain of divine fire deals 10d6 damage per round to evil creatures.

**Rain of Frogs:** Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

**[[Rain of Needles (Spell)|Rain of Needles]]****:** Ranged attacks deal total 1d4/level damage (max 5d4).

**[[Rain of Roses (Spell)|Rain of Roses]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Roses fall from the sky; evil creatures take 1d4 Wis damage per round and are [[Sickened|sickened]].

**[[Rain of Spines (Spell)|Rain of Spines]]****:** Spines rain down on area, dealing 6d6 damage and pinning creatures to ground.

**[[Rainbow Beam (Spell)|Rainbow Beam]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Ray dazzles and deals 1d12 damage/3 levels of random type.

**[[Rainbow Blast (Spell)|Rainbow Blast]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Line deals 1d6 damage of each energy type.

**[[Rainbow Pattern (Spell)|Rainbow Pattern]]****:** Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.

**[[Raise Dead (Spell)|Raise Dead]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

**[[Raise from the Deep (Spell)|Raise from the Deep]]****:** Creature or sunken ship made buoyant.

**[[Raise Ghost (Spell)|Raise Ghost]]****:** Restores dead person or ghost as a ghost.

**[[Raise Ice Forest (Spell)|Raise Ice Forest]]****:** Conjures trees of ice.

**[[Raise Volcano (Spell)|Raise Volcano]]****:** Create a relatively small (but still quite devastating) artificial volcano.

**[[Rally Point (Spell)|Rally Point]]****:** Square gives good creatures bonuses.

**[[Ram's Might (Spell)|Ram’s Might]]****:** Gain +2 to Strength and your unarmed attacks deal normal damage.

**[[Rampart (Spell)|Rampart]]****:** Creates 5-ft.-thick earthen barrier.

**[[Rankletaste (Spell)|Rankletaste]]****:** Anyone (or thing) who tastes the target must make a Will save or be [[Nauseated|nauseated]] for 1 round.

**[[Rapid Burrowing (Spell)|Rapid Burrowing]]****:** +20 ft. to subject’s burrow speed.

**[[Raptor Cloud (Spell)|Raptor Cloud]]****:** Avian shadows grant cover, deal damage to attackers, grant bonuses on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (v3.5 Jump and Tumble) checks.

**[[Raptor's Sight (Spell)|Raptor’s Sight]]****:** Gain +5 on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5: Spot) checks; range increment penalty halved.

**[[Rapture of Rupture (Spell)|Rapture of Rupture]]****:** Subject takes 6d6 damage and is [[Stunned|stunned]], then takes 1d6 damage per round thereafter.

**[[Rapture of the Deep (Spell)|Rapture of the Deep]]****:** Target becomes comatose.

**[[Ravage (Spell)|Ravage]]****:** A pillar of black, unholy power deals 1d6 vile damage/2 levels (max 10d6).

**[[Ravenous Darkness (Spell)|Ravenous Darkness]]****:** Touched object sheds darkness; living creatures nearby take 1d6/round negative energy damage 

     while undead gain fast healing 1.

**[[Razorscales (Spell)|Razorscales]]**: Your scales become razor-sharp.

**[[Ray Deflection (Spell)|Ray Deflection]]****:** Ray attacks are reflected away.

**[[Ray of Clumsiness (Spell)|Ray of Clumsiness]]****:** Victim takes 1d6 Dexterity penalty +1/2 levels.

**[[Ray of Deanimation (Spell)|Ray of Deanimation]]****:** Ray deals 1d6 damage/level to constructs.

**[[Ray of Dizziness (Spell)|Ray of Dizziness]]****:** Subject can take only move or standard actions.

**[[Ray of Enfeeblement (Spell)|Ray of Enfeeblement]]****:** Ray causes 1d6 Str penalty + 1 per 2 levels.

**[[Ray of Entropy (Spell)|Ray of Entropy]]****:** Subject takes –4 Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution.

**[[Ray of Exhaustion (Spell)|Ray of Exhaustion]]****:** Ray makes subject [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**[[Ray of Flame (Spell)|Ray of Flame]]****:** Ray deals 1d6/2 levels fire damage, ignites subject.

**[[Ray of Frost (Spell)|Ray of Frost]]****:** Ray deals 1d3 cold damage.

**[[Ray of Hope (Spell)|Ray of Hope]]****:** Subject gains +2 bonus on attacks, saves, and checks.

**[[Ray of Ice (Spell)|Ray of Ice]]****:** Ray deals 1d6 cold damage/2 levels.

**[[Ray of Light (Spell)|Ray of Light]]****:** Ray blinds subject.

**[[Ray of Resurgence]]****:** Yellow light restores 1 point per caster level (max 5 points) of Strength damage, 

     negates penalties to Strength (up to 1d6+1 per caster level, max 1d6+5) and either converts exhaustion to fatigue or removes fatigue.

**[[Ray of Retaliation]]****:** Ray attack is reflected back at its originator to deal force damage.

**Ray of Sickening:** Ray makes the subject [[Sickened|sickened]].

**[[Ray of Sickness (Spell)|Ray of Sickness]]****:** Subject becomes [[Sickened|sickened]].

**[[Ray of Stupidity (Spell)|Ray of Stupidity]]****:** Victim takes 1d4+1 Intelligence damage.

**[[Ray of the Python (Spell)|Ray of the Python]]****:** Creature can only attack once per round, cannot make attacks of opportunity, –10 ft. penalty to speed.

**[[Ray of Weakness (Spell)|Ray of Weakness]]****:** Subject takes –2 on attacks, –10 ft. speed.

**[[Razorfangs (Spell)|Razorfangs]]****:** Your bite or claw attack threatens a critical hit on a 19 or 20.

**[[Reachwalker's Wariness (Spell)|Reachwalker’s Wariness]]****:** Automatically locate aberrations within 30 ft.

**[[Reactive Perception (Spell)|Reactive Perception]]****:** Target uses its Cha or Int (Cha for sorcerers and Int for assassins and wizards) modifier 

     to determine the number of attacks of opportunities it may make.

**[[Read Magic (Spell)|Read Magic]]****:** Read scrolls and spellbooks.

**[[Reality Blind (Spell)|Reality Blind]]****:** Subject can take no actions and afterward does not heal naturally.

**[[Reality Maelstrom (Spell)|Reality Maelstrom]]****:** Hole in reality sends creatures and objects to another plane.

**[[Reanimation (Spell)|Reanimation]]****:** Dead creature restored to functional half life with 1 hp.

**[[Reaving Aura (Spell)|Reaving Aura]]****:** All creatures below 0 hit points within 10 feet of you take 1 point of damage.

**[[Reaving Dispel (Spell)|Reaving Dispel]]****:** On a targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, steal spell power and effects for yourself.

**[[Rebirth of Iron (Spell)|Rebirth of Iron]]****:** Completely restores any metal item destroyed by rust, even if reduced to powder.

**[[Rebuke (Spell)|Rebuke]]****:** Foes take 1d8 damage/two caster levels (max 5d8).

**[[Rebuking Breath (Spell)|Rebuking Breath]]****:** Your breath weapon rebukes undead.

**[[Recharge Innate Magic (Spell)|Recharge Innate Magic]]****:** You regain one use of all 0-level through 3rd-level spell-like abilities.

**[[Recharge Innate Magic, Greater (Spell)|Recharge Innate Magic, Greater]]****:** You regain one use of all 0-level through 5th-level spell-like abilities.

**[[Recharge Innate Magic, Lesser (Spell)|Recharge Innate Magic, Lesser]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Regain a use of all 0-level and 1st-level spell-like abilities.

**[[Reciprocal Gyre (Spell)|Reciprocal Gyre]]****:** Creature or object takes 1d12 damage/level of spell affecting it (max 25d12).

**[[Recitation (Spell)|Recitation]]****:** Your allies get bonus on AC, attacks and saves.

**Reckless Infatuation:** Target is compelled to stay near another.

**Recoil Fire:** Ammunition in the targeted firearm generates excessive recoil.

**[[Reconstruct (Spell)|Reconstruct]]****:** Channel energy into a construct to wipe away damage and afflictions.

**[[Red Fester (Spell)|Red Fester]]****:** Subject takes 1d6 Str damage and 1d4 Cha damage.

**[[Red Hand of the Killer (Spell)|Red Hand of the Killer]]****:** Stain the hand of a creature’s killer red.

**[[Red Tide (Spell)|Red Tide]]****:** Nauseating water knocks foes prone and deals Strength damage.

**[[Redefine the Tools of War (Spell)|Redefine the Tools of War]]****:** Changes weapons and armor into other items of same type.

**[[Redemption From Evil Power (Spell)|Redemption From Evil Power]]****:** Undoes the effects of an evil spell cast within 1 round.

**[[Redirect Spell (Spell)|Redirect Spell]]****:** Spells targeting ally target you instead.

**[[Reduce Animal (Spell)|Reduce Animal]]****:** Shrinks one willing animal.

**[[Reduce Person (Spell)|Reduce Person]]****:** Humanoid creature halves in size.

**[[Reduce Person, Greater (Spell)|Reduce Person, Greater]]****:** Subject remains reduced for 10 minutes/level.

**[[Reduce Person, Mass (Spell)|Reduce Person, Mass]]****:** As *[[Reduce Person (Spell)|reduce person]]*, but affects 1 humanoid creature/level.

**[[Refine Improvised Weapon (Spell)|Refine Improvised Weapon]]****:** Transform improvised weapon into a masterwork simple or martial weapon.

**[[Reflective Disguise (Spell)|Reflective Disguise]]****:** Viewers see you as their own species and gender.

**[[Reflective Disguise, Mass (Spell)|Reflective Disguise, Mass]]****:** Viewers see subjects as their own species and gender.

**[[Refreshment (Spell)|Refreshment]]****:** Cures all nonlethal damage on one creature.

**[[Refuge (Spell)|Refuge]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

**[[Refusal (Spell)|Refusal]]****:** Spellcasters and creatures with spell-like abilities are prevented from entering an area.

**[[Regal Procession (Spell)|Regal Procession]]****:** As *[[Mount (Spell)|mount]]*, but you summon several mounts.

**[[Regenerate (Spell)|Regenerate]]****:** Subject’s severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

**[[Regroup (Spell)|Regroup]]****:** Teleports nearby allies to your side.

**[[Reincarnate (Spell)|Reincarnate]]****:** Brings dead subject back in a random body.

**Reinforce Armaments:** Temporarily mitigates the fragile quality in targeted weapon or armor.

**Reinforce Armaments, Communal:** As *reinforce armaments*, but you may divide the duration among objects touched.

**[[Reinforce Construct (Spell)|Reinforce Construct]]****:** Construct gains 1d6 + 1/level temporary hit points.

**[[Rejection (Spell)|Rejection]]****:** Creatures within cone are blasted away from you.

**[[Rejuvenate Eidolon (Spell)|Rejuvenate Eidolon]]****:** As *[[Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser (Spell)|lesser rejuvenate eidolon]]*, but cures 3d10 damage +1/level (max +10).

**[[Rejuvenate Eidolon, Greater (Spell)|Rejuvenate Eidolon, Greater]]****:** As *[[Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser (Spell)|lesser rejuvenate eidolon]]*, but cures 5d10 damage +1/level (max +20).

**[[Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser (Spell)|Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser]]****:** Eidolon cured 1d10 damage +1/level (max +5).

**[[Rejuvenating Light (Spell)|Rejuvenating Light]]****:** Touched object sheds light; undead nearby take 1d6/round positive energy damage while living creatures gain fast healing 1.

**[[Rejuvenation Cocoon (Spell)|Rejuvenation Cocoon]]****:** Energy cocoon shields creature, then heals it.

**[[Rejuvenative Corpse (Spell)|Rejuvenative Corpse]]****:** Negative energy fills corpse, feeding undead healed.

**[[Remorseless Charm (Spell)|Remorseless Charm]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Suppress the target’s alignment, removing all alignment-related inhibitions.

**[[Remove Addiction (Spell)|Remove Addiction]]****:** Cures target of drug addictions.

**[[Remove Blindness_Deafness (Spell)|Remove Blindness/Deafness]]****:** Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.

**[[Remove Curse (Spell)|Remove Curse]]****:** Frees object or person from curse.

**[[Remove Disease (Spell)|Remove Disease]]****:** Cures all diseases affecting subject.

**[[Remove Fatigue (Spell)|Remove Fatigue]]****:** Removes effects of fatigue as 8 hours of rest.

**[[Remove Fear (Spell)|Remove Fear]]****:** Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

**[[Remove Nausea (Spell)|Remove Nausea]]****:** Cure a [[Nauseated|nauseated]] or [[Sickened|sickened]] character.

**[[Remove Paralysis (Spell)|Remove Paralysis]]****:** Frees creatures from paralysis or *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]* effect.

**[[Remove Scent (Spell)|Remove Scent]]****:** Hides touched creature’s scent.

**Remove Sickness:** Suppress disease, nausea, and the [[Sickened|sickened]] condition.

**[[Rend Essentia (Spell)|Rend Essentia]]** **<sup>I</sup>:** Deal Charisma damage or essentia damage to foe; gain essentia.

**[[Rend Shadow Weave (Spell)|Rend Shadow Weave]]****:** Create an area of dead magic that affects the Shadow Weave but not the Weave.

**[[Renew the Land (Spell)|Renew the Land]]****:** The target area experiences an immediate renewal of all natural life (animal and plant).

**[[Renewal Pact (Spell)|Renewal Pact]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creature is automatically healed if adverse condition affects it.

**[[Renewed Vigor (Spell)|Renewed Vigor]]****:** Remove fatigue and +2 bonus to Constitution for 1 round/level.

**[[Renovation (Spell)|Renovation]] <sup>M</sup>:** Rearrange and resize rooms in a building you constructed.

**[[Repair Critical Damage (Spell)|Repair Critical Damage]]****:** Repairs 4d8 damage +1/level (max +20) to any construct.

**[[Repair Light Damage (Spell)|Repair Light Damage]]****:** Repairs 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5) to any construct.

**[[Repair Light Damage, Mass (Spell)|Repair Light Damage, Mass]]****:** Repairs 1d8 damage +1/level for many constructs.

**[[Repair Minor Damage (Spell)|Repair Minor Damage]]****:** Repairs 1 point of damage to any construct.

**[[Repair Moderate Damage (Spell)|Repair Moderate Damage]]****:** Repairs 2d8 damage +1/level (max +10) to any construct.

**[[Repair Moderate Damage, Mass (Spell)|Repair Moderate Damage, Mass]]****:** Repairs 2d8 damage +1/level for many constructs.

**[[Repair Serious Damage (Spell)|Repair Serious Damage]]****:** Repairs 3d8 damage +1/level (max +15) to any construct.

**[[Repair Undead (Spell)|Repair Undead]]****:** Heals one undead of 1d8 hp + 1/level (max +5).

**[[Repair Undead, Mass (Spell)|Repair Undead, Mass]]****:** Heals undead of 1d8 hp + 1/level; affects 1 undead/level.

**[[Repel Ectoplasm (Spell)|Repel Ectoplasm]]****:** As *[[Repel Wood (Spell)|repel wood]]*, but affecting only ectoplasm.

**[[Repel Metal or Stone (Spell)|Repel Metal or Stone]]****:** Pushes away metal and stone.

**[[Repel Vermin (Spell)|Repel Vermin]]****:** Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

**[[Repel Wood (Spell)|Repel Wood]]****:** Pushes away wooden objects.

**[[Repelling Shield (Spell)|Repelling Shield]]****:** Invisible disc gives +4 to AC, blocks magic missiles, pushes away attackers.

**[[Replicate Casting (Spell)|Replicate Casting]]****:** Duplicate observed spell or spell-like ability.

**[[Reproval (Spell)|Reproval]]****:** Subject is [[Dazed|dazed]] 1 round, then [[Shaken|shaken]].

**[[Reproval, Final (Spell)|Reproval, Final]]****:** As *[[Reproval (Spell)|reproval]]*, except the subject must save or die.

**[[Reproval, Greater (Spell)|Reproval, Greater]]****:** Subject cowers for 1d4 rounds.

**[[Repulsion (Spell)|Repulsion]]****:** Creatures can’t approach you.

**[[Residual Tracking (Spell)|Residual Tracking]]****:** Tell creature's appearance by footprint.

**[[Resilient Reservoir (Spell)|Resilient Reservoir]] <sup>R</sup>:** Store hit point damage as magical energy.

**[[Resilient Sphere (Spell)|Resilient Sphere]]****:** Force globe protects but traps one subject.

**Resinous Skin:** You gain DR 5/piercing and +4 to CMD against [[Disarm|disarm]] attempts.

**[[Resinous Tar (Spell)|Resinous Tar]]****:** Sticky substance slows movement or renders object difficult to drop.

**[[Resist Dweomer (Spell)|Resist Dweomer]]****:** Grants +3 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.

**[[Resist Energy (Spell)|Resist Energy]]****:** Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.

**Resist Energy, Communal:** As *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

**[[Resist Energy, Mass (Spell)|Resist Energy, Mass]]****:** Creatures ignore damage from specified energy type.

**[[Resist Planar Alignment (Spell)|Resist Planar Alignment]]****:** Subject can resist penalties for being of an opposed alignment on an aligned Outer Plane.

**[[Resist Taint (Spell)|Resist Taint]]****:** Bestows +4 bonus on saves against taint.

**[[Resist Touch (Spell)|Resist Touch]]****:** Adds +2 luck bonus +1/three caster levels to touch AC.

**[[Resistance (Spell)|Resistance]]****:** Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

**[[Resistance, Greater (Spell)|Resistance, Greater]]****:** Subject gains +3 on saving throws.

**[[Resistance, Superior (Spell)|Resistance, Superior]]****:** Subject gains +6 on saving throws.

**[[Resistance Item (Spell)|Resistance Item]]****:** Item bestows +1 or better resistance bonus on saving throws.

**[[Resonating Agony (Spell)|Resonating Agony]]****:** Subject [[Nauseated|nauseated]] or [[Sickened|sickened]] for 1 round/level.

**[[Resonating Bolt (Spell)|Resonating Bolt]]****:** Sonic energy deals 1d4 damage/level (max 10d4).

**[[Resonating Resistance (Spell)|Resonating Resistance]]****:** Foes must check spell resistance twice against caster.

**Resonating Word:** Target is damaged, [[Staggered|staggered]], and [[Stunned|stunned]].

**[[Resounding Blow (Spell)|Resounding Blow]]****:** Melee attack deals 1d6 more damage.

**[[Resounding Thunder (Spell)|Resounding Thunder]]****:** Lasting sound deals 4d6 sonic damage per round, deafens creatures within area.

**[[Resounding Voice (Spell)|Resounding Voice]]****:** Your voice carries 100 ft./level.

**[[Rest Eternal (Spell)|Rest Eternal]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Dead creature cannot be revived.

**[[Restful Sleep (Spell)|Restful Sleep]]****:** Gain more hit points while sleeping.

**[[Restful Slumber (Spell)|Restful Slumber]]****:** Sleep soundly, without nightmares.

**[[Restoration (Spell)|Restoration]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Restores level and ability score drains.

**[[Restoration, Greater (Spell)|Restoration, Greater]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Restoration (Spell)|restoration]]*, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

**[[Restoration, Lesser (Spell)|Restoration, Lesser]]****:** Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

**[[Restoration, Mass (Spell)|Restoration, Mass]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Restoration (Spell)|restoration]]*, but multiple subjects.

**Restore Corpse:** Skeletal corpse grows flesh.

**[[Restore Soul's Treasure (Spell)|Restore Soul's Treasure]]****:** Restores a magic item destroyed by *[[Soul's Treasure Lost (Spell)|soul’s treasure lost]]* spell.

**[[Resurgence (Spell)|Resurgence]]****:** You grant subject a second chance at a saving throw.

**[[Resurgence, Mass (Spell)|Resurgence, Mass]]****:** As *[[Resurgence (Spell)|resurgence]]*, but multiple subjects.

**[[Resurgent Transformation (Spell)|Resurgent Transformation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Gain second wind when close to death.

**[[Resurrection (Spell)|Resurrection]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Fully restore dead subject.

**[[Retribution (Spell)|Retribution]]****:** Recent attacker is afflicted with penalties.

**[[Retributive Enervation (Spell)|Retributive Enervation]]****:** Any living creature that strikes you in melee gains a negative level.

**[[Retributive Image (Spell)|Retributive Image]]****:** Created illusion deals damage to those who disbelieve it.

**[[Retributive Strike (Spell)|Retributive Strike]]****:** Melee attacks against you draw an attack of opportunity.

**[[Return and Avenge (Spell)|Return and Avenge]]****:** Summoned creature returns if destroyed and attacks slayer.

**[[Return to the Sea, Greater (Spell)|Return to the Sea, Greater]]****:** Grafts gills to the neck or chest of the target.

**[[Return to Nature (Spell)|Return to Nature]]****:** Reduces Intelligence and magical abilities of target.

**Returning Weapon:** Grants a weapon the *[[Returning (MagWpnSpcAb)|returning]]* special weapon quality.

**Returning Weapon, Communal:** As *returning weapon*, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

**[[Reveille (Spell)|Reveille]]****:** Dead creature speaks a short sentence about what caused its death.

**[[Revenance (Spell)|Revenance]]****:** Restores dead creature to life for 1 minute/ level.

**[[Reverse Arrows (Spell)|Reverse Arrows]]****:** As *[[Protection from Arrows (Spell)|protection from arrows]]*, but negated arrows turn back upon their source.

**[[Reverse Gravity (Spell)|Reverse Gravity]]****:** Objects and creatures fall upward.

**[[Revitalize Legacy, Least (Spell)|Revitalize Legacy, Least]]****:** Get extra use of chosen least legacy ability.

**[[Revitalize Legacy, Lesser (Spell)|Revitalize Legacy, Lesser]]****:** Get extra use of chosen lesser legacy ability.

**[[Revitalize Legacy, Greater (Spell)|Revitalize Legacy, Greater]]****:** Get extra use of chosen greater legacy ability.

**[[Revive Outsider (Spell)|Revive Outsider]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You restore life to a dead outsider.

**[[Revive Undead (Spell)|Revive Undead]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Restores undeath to undead that was destroyed up to 1 day/level ago.

**[[Revivification (Spell)|Revivification]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Restores life to subject who died very recently.

**[[Revivify (Spell)|Revivify]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Restore recently dead to life with no level loss.

**[[Revivify, Greater (Spell)|Revivify, Greater]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Revivify (Spell)|revivify]]**,* but with 1 round/level instead of 1 round after death before the spell must be cast.

**[[Reviving Finale (Spell)|Reviving Finale]]****:** Allies cured 2d6 damage.

## Rf-Rj
**[[Rhino's Rush (Spell)|Rhino’s Rush]]****:** Next charge deals double damage.

**[[Ride of the Valenar (Spell)|Ride of the Valenar]]****:** Gain +5 bonus on [[Ride (Skill)|Ride]] for 10 minutes/level.

**[[Righteous Aura (Spell)|Righteous Aura]]****:** You detonate on death, healing good creatures and damaging others (2d6/level damage).

**[[Righteous Burst (Spell)|Righteous Burst]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Allies healed, enemies damaged 1d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

**[[Righteous Exile (Spell)|Righteous Exile]]****:** Deal damage to evil creatures and banish evil outsiders.

**[[Righteous Fury (Spell)|Righteous Fury]]****:** Gain temporary hp, +4 to Strength.

**[[Righteous Glare (Spell)|Righteous Glare]]****:** Your gaze attack kills evil creatures with less than 5 HD, causes fear in others.

**[[Righteous Might (Spell)|Righteous Might]]****:** Your size increases, and you gain bonuses in combat.

**[[Righteous Smite (Spell)|Righteous Smite]]****:** Deals 1d6 damage/level (1d8 damage/level to evil outsiders) in 20-ft. radius and blinds evil foes for 1d4 rounds.

**[[Righteous Vigor (Spell)|Righteous Vigor]]:** Boosts attack bonus with each hit.

**[[Righteous Wrath of the Faithful (Spell)|Righteous Wrath of the Faithful]]****:** Your allies gain extra attack, +3 on attack rolls and damage rolls.

**[[Rigor Mortis (Spell)|Rigor Mortis]]****:** Suspends all vital functions; target appears dead.

**[[Ring of Blades (Spell)|Ring of Blades]]****:** Blades surround you, damaging other creatures (1d6+1/level damage).

**[[Ring of Lava (Spell)|Ring of Lava]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Create a spreading area of lava.

**[[Ripcurrent (Spell)|Ripcurrent]]****:** Cause a sudden and violent current to tear through all liquids in the spell's area.

**[[River of Wind (Spell)|River of Wind]]:** Creates wind that causes nonlethal damage and can knock down or push creatures.

**[[River Whip (Spell)|River Whip]]:** Create a whip of water that you wield as a weapon.

## Rk-Ro
**[[Roar of the Waves (Spell)|Roar of the Waves]]:** Make one target/2 levels [[Deafened|deafened]] and [[Shaken|shaken]].

**[[Roc's Form (Spell)|Roc’s Form]]:** You take the form of a roc.

**[[Rock Catch (Spell)|Rock Catch]]:** Catch hurled rocks.

**[[Rockburst (Spell)|Rockburst]]:** Cause stone object to explode, dealing 1d4 damage +1 point/level.

**[[Rogue's Stab (Spell)|Rogue’s Stab]]:** May sneak attack creatures denied Dexterity bonus to AC.

**[[Rogue's Stab, Greater (Spell)|Rogue’s Stab, Greater]]:** As *[[Rogue's Stab (Spell)|rogue's stab]],* but may sneak attack creatures denied Dexterity bonus to AC for more damage.

**[[Rooftop Strider (Spell)|Rooftop Strider]]:** Move across uneven surfaces with ease.

**[[Rope Trick (Spell)|Rope Trick]]:** As many as eight creatures hide in extradimensional space.

**[[Rot of Ages (Spell)|Rot of Ages]]:** Cloud of rotting debris sickens or nauseates one creature, provides concealment for others.

**[[Rotting Curse of Urfestra (Spell)|Rotting Curse of Urfestra]]:** Subject takes 1d6 Con damage per hour.

**[[Rouse (Spell)|Rouse]]:** Awakens creatures in area.

## Ru-Rz
**[[Ruby Ray of Reversal (Spell)|Ruby Ray of Reversal]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Ray negates magical or mundane hazards.

**[[Ruin Delver's Fortune (Spell)|Ruin Delver’s Fortune]]****:** Cast on another creature’s turn and choose one of several benefits.

**[[Runic Marker (Spell)|Runic Marker]]****:** Create a slender stone pillar that can have a message of up to 25 words; also can have a *[[Glyph of Warding (Spell)|glyph of warding]]* effect.

**[[Rushing Waters (Spell)|Rushing Waters]]:** Wave makes [[Bull Rush|bull rush]] attack.

**[[Rust Ray (Spell)|Rust Ray]]:** Metal objects take 2d6 damage +1/2 levels.

**[[Rusted Blade (Spell)|Rusted Blade]]****:** Touched weapon delivers [[Filth Fever|filth fever]].

**[[Rusting Fog (Spell)|Rusting Fog]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Billowing vapors destroy metal items.

**[[Rusting Grasp (Spell)|Rusting Grasp]]****:** Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.
